jd: From: Srivalli, Fluxteksolutions srivalli@fluxteksol.com Reply to: srivalli@fluxteksol.com Job Title: Oracle DBA Job Location: Ashburn, VA or Cary, NC Job Duration: +12 Months (Remote) VISA Status: USC,GC,H1B Experience: 8-10 years Job Description: Need of DBA with Top Secret security clearance active and CompTIA+ certifications, Data Guard, Goldengate, Replication, Performance Tuning are must. Skillset: Well experienced hands-on Oracle DBA with must of RAC experience with production environment tasks – creating RAC clusters from scratch – across multi data centers with multi node on each…. Golden Gate experience for active-active replication across data centers Data guard experience for active-passive DR needs DB Backup/Recovery/production env alerts/monitoring Oracle Grid… DB Performance monitoring – tuning – logs retention – alerts setup and monitoring Oracle Patches installation as needed with packages development/deployment. Application SQL performance fine tuning/monitoring – guiding app teams for eff SQL code.
